curriculum.section_title: Domain I: Number and Quantity (Praxis Core Math 5733)

topics.topic: Place value, naming decimal numbers, ordering and rounding (number line intuition)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Conceptual place value & decimals (visual models)
YouTube Search: Math Antics (place value / decimals) – conceptual explanations
OpenStax (Prealgebra 2e) Manipulative Mathematics for Students — Number line activities (whole numbers, integers, fractions)

topics.topic: Integers, decimals, and fractions as numbers (multiple representations; compare/order; operations as meaning)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Fractions as division / meaning of numerator & denominator (conceptual)
YouTube Search: Math Antics (fractions concepts: parts vs division; types of fractions)
OpenStax (Prealgebra 2e) Manipulative Mathematics for Students — Fraction models (equivalent fractions; mixed numbers; fraction operations via models)

topics.topic: Ratios, proportions, and proportional reasoning (including ratios of 3 quantities; part-whole contexts)

YouTube Search: Proportional reasoning (double number line / tape diagrams)
Google Search (PDF): proportional reasoning visuals (double number line, tape diagram) filetype:pdf

topics.topic: Percents (fraction/decimal equivalence; percent of a quantity; percent change; percent of percent)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Percents as 'per 100' (conceptual models, grids, number lines)
YouTube Search: Math Antics (percents and equivalent fractions) – conceptual
Google Search (PDF): percent change conceptual explanation (visual models) filetype:pdf

topics.topic: Constant rates and unit rates (rates of change in context; interpreting slope-as-rate informally)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Unit rate & constant rate (conceptual, tables/graphs)
OpenStax (Prealgebra 2e) Manipulative Mathematics for Students — Exploring slopes of lines (rate as “rise over run”)

topics.topic: Properties of whole numbers (factors, multiples, primes, divisibility, GCD/LCM via structure)

YouTube Search: GCD & LCM (meaning-based approaches: prime factorization, Venn factor method)

topics.topic: Units, measurement, unit conversion, and scale (U.S. customary + metric; estimation; conversion factors)

YouTube Search: Metric system & U.S. customary system overview (conceptual)
Google Search (PDF): conversion factors dimensional analysis worksheet filetype:pdf

resources.title: YouTube Search: Counterexample in mathematics (what it is; how to find one)
Google Search (PDF): counterexamples in arithmetic and number properties filetype:pdf
OpenStax (Prealgebra 2e) Links to Literacy — Reading and reasoning about mathematical statements

topics.topic: Real-life problem solving: selecting relevant information/operations; rounding in context

resources.title: YouTube Search: Translating word problems (identify quantities, units, and operations) — conceptual strategies
Google Search (PDF): word-problem reading strategies (identify relevant information) filetype:pdf

curriculum.section_title: Domain II: Data Interpretation & Representation, Statistics, and Probability (Praxis Core Math 5733)

topics.topic: Interpreting data displays (tables, bar graphs, line graphs, histograms, box plots, circle graphs, scatterplots, stem-and-leaf, number lines)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Reading data displays (interpretation-focused, not just calculation)
YouTube Search: CrashCourse Statistics (visualization & interpretation) — conceptual playlist
Google Search (PDF): interpreting graphs and data displays filetype:pdf

topics.topic: Measures of center and spread (mean, median, mode, range; basic standard deviation intuition; effects of shifting/scaling data)

resources.title: YouTube Search: StatQuest (mean/median/mode; spread/variance) — intuition-first
YouTube Search: Why standard deviation works (conceptual intuition)
Google Search (PDF): measures of center and spread + effect of adding/multiplying constants filetype:pdf

topics.topic: Random samples and drawing inferences (sample vs population; variability; basic sampling language)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Sampling vs population (conceptual statistics)
YouTube Search: Sampling bias and why random sampling matters (conceptual)
Google Search (PDF): random sampling inference basics filetype:pdf

topics.topic: Scatterplots, association, and linear relationships (positive/negative association; outliers)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Interpreting scatterplots (direction, form, strength, outliers) — conceptual
YouTube Search: Correlation coefficient explained (conceptual, not computation-heavy)
Google Search (PDF): scatterplot interpretation (direction/strength/outliers) filetype:pdf

topics.topic: Correlation vs causation (reasoning with contextual information; confounding variables)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Correlation vs causation (clear conceptual explanations)
YouTube Search: Spurious correlations & confounding (examples that build intuition)
Google Search (PDF): correlation vs causation confounding variables filetype:pdf

topics.topic: Using a linear model to make predictions (line of best fit meaning; interpolation vs extrapolation)

resources.title: YouTube Search: Line of best fit (what it means in context; prediction limits) — conceptual
OpenStax (Prealgebra 2e) Manipulative Mathematics for Students — Slope of a line between two points (bridging to linear models)
Google Search (PDF): linear model prediction (best fit line meaning) filetype:pdf

Google Search (PDF): introduction to probability sample space event complement filetype:pdf
